items.sentence: You should probably speak a little bit slower.
You should stick those pictures in your album.
Find Tom and tell him to come here right away.
French is definitely not a difficult language.
Get up at once, or you will miss the 7:00 bus.
Give me one good reason why I should help you.
Go and get a chair from the next room, please.
I have to go. There\'s someone waiting for me.
I have to hurry. I\'m falling behind schedule.
This is the first French book I\'ve ever read.
